## 1. Problem Detection Webhook
Triggered by backend when a problem is detected or promoted.
**POST** `/webhook/problem-detected`
Expected body: `{ problem_id, title, affected_tickets_count, priority }`

## 2. Enrich from Backend
Fetch full problem details from FastAPI.
Stores inbound data in a Set node before the HTTP call so context is never lost.

## 3. Email Notification
Sends a structured plain-text email to the problem response team.
SMTP config via n8n credentials — set PROBLEM_ALERT_EMAIL_TO in n8n env.

## 4. Error Handling
All failure paths converge here. Errors are logged to console for n8n execution logs.
